K12D0604_H0581:411a-12: de bzhin snyems dang bcas bshad pa //
K12D0604_H0581:411a-13: tsham ngam bdag nyid chen po 'di //
K12D0604_H0581:411a-14: 'jigs par byed pa zhes bya ste //
K12D0604_H0581:411a-15: rtag tu khro bo sgom pa'o //
K12D0604_H0581:411a-16: rkang pa mnyam par bzhag ste 'dug /
K12D0604_H0581:411a-17: g-yas pa cung zad mtho bar bya //
K12D0604_H0581:411a-18: dpal dang ldan pas g-yon pa smad //
K12D0604_H0581:411a-19: g-yon pa sor mo gcig ni bsdigs //
K12D0604_H0581:411a-20: dpung pa bteg ste be con 'phyar //
K12D0604_H0581:411a-21: rkang pa dang ni gdong bsgyur ba; ;rtag tu khro bo sgom pa ni //
K12D0604_H0581:411a-22: k'i li k'i la zhes bya'o //
K12D0604_H0581:411a-23: k'i li k'i la chen po ni //
K12D0604_H0581:411a-24: de nyid las ni rgyab tu blta //
K12D0604_H0581:411a-25: khro bo mig ni ya gcig btsums //
K12D0604_H0581:411a-26: myur du mchong stabs byed pa'o //
K12D0604_H0581:411a-27: 'di ni tsham ngam sbyor ba ste //
K12D0604_H0581:411a-28: he la'i 'khor lo rtsibs rim las //
K12D0604_H0581:411a-29: mdor na ji ltar dgod pa dag /
K12D0604_H0581:411a-30: legs par bshad pa 'di yin no //
K12D0604_H0581:411b-0: he @411b la'i 'khor lo'i mthu sngags dang //
K12D0604_H0581:411b-1: tsham ngam g-yas kyi mthu dga' yis //
K12D0604_H0581:411b-2: las rnams rab tu ngo mtshar ba //
K12D0604_H0581:411b-3: ji skad gsungs pa'i las rnams bya'o //
K12D0604_H0581:411b-4: sgrub pa de dag gsang rgyud dang //
K12D0604_H0581:411b-6: khro bo dngos dang gcig 'gyur bas //
K12D0604_H0581:411b-7: khro bo'i skad du spyod par 'gyur //
K12D0604_H0581:411b-8: rtog pa 'di ni gsang bar bcas //
K12D0604_H0581:411b-9: gsang ba'i snying pe'i mchog tu bshad //
K12D0604_H0581:411b-10: khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog 'di las //
K12D0604_H0581:411b-11: mchog tu gyur pa gzhan med do //
K12D0604_H0581:411b-12: khro bo rnam par rgyal ba las //
K12D0604_H0581:411b-13: rtog pa phyi ma'i phyi ma 'di //
K12D0604_H0581:411b-14: rab tu gsang ba zhes bya ba //
K12D0604_H0581:411b-15: thos nas gsang ba'i don bsgoms pas //
K12D0604_H0581:411b-16: lha de thams cad yi rang nas //
K12D0604_H0581:411b-17: khro bo mchog la phyag 'tshal te //
K12D0604_H0581:411b-18: rab tu dga' ba'i mchog tu 'gyur //
K12D0604_H0581:411b-19: gsang ba'i rtog par gtogs pa lnga pa ste /
K12D0604_H0581:411b-20: bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gshen rje'i gshed po la
K12D0604_H0581:411b-21: rjes su yi rang ba'i rim par phye ba ste
